summary: In 1965, Jimmy McMahon and his group of Liverpudlians plot to win the annual céilí music competition in Ireland.
cast: Bernard Hill|Charlotte Bradley|Andrea Corr|Stephen Brennan|Eamonn Owens|Malachy Bourke|Brendan O'Hare|Ian Shaw|Leslie Bingham|Colm Meaney|Shaun Evans|Philip Barantini|Frank Twomey|Emmet Kirwan|Noel Bridgeman|Russell Smith|Aidan Mulholland|Margi Clarke|Pat Laffan|Jo Taylor|Bridie Canning|Cha Cha Seigne|Rob Kolar|Philip Richey|Marc O'Shea|James Doran|Nuala O'Neill|Brian Devlin|Catherine Byrne|Sean Brown|Aiden McKenna|Mary Jordan|Bill Boylan|Pascal Scott|Alan Crozier|T.P. McKenna|Frank Kelly|Patrick Bergin|Horace Oliver|Zela Gayle|Zelia Attzs|Aisling McCaffery|Elliott Ngubane|Biggy Bigmore|Tony Brown|Laurence Doherty|Simpson McKendry|James Nesbitt
title: The Boys from County Clare
